project_plan.name: Random Password Generator in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a Python script that generates a random password with configurable criteria.

task.name: Implement password generation logic to include uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.
Create a function to allow the user to specify the length of the password.
Write tests to validate password generation functionality, including checking for character diversity and length.
Execute tests to verify that the password generation works correctly according to user specifications.
